perks.text: Replace one -1 with one +1 %wound%, "%wound%, self" card
Replace one -1 with one +1 %wound%, "%wound%, self" card
Replace one -1 with one +1 %poison%, "%poison%, self" card
Replace one -1 with one +1 %poison%, "%poison%, self" card
Add one +0 "Add + 1 %damage% for each condition you have" card
Add one +0 "Add + 1 %damage% for each condition you have" card
Add one "%ward%, %regenerate%, self"%flip% card
Add one "%ward%, %regenerate%, self"%flip% card
Add one -2 %brittle% and one  +3"%brittle%, self" card
Ignore item - 1 effects and remove one +0 card
At the start of each scenario you may perform "%strengthen%, %wound%, self" or "%ward%, %immobilize%, self"
Once each scenario, avoid an Overdrive exhaustion check
Once each scenario, during your turn, remove any number of negative conditions you have
Replace one -2 card with one -4 "%use%%any% : %bane%" card
Replace one -1 card with one %ice%%flip% and one %air%%flip% card
Replace one -1 card with one %ice%%flip% and one %air%%flip% card
Replace one -1 card with one %pierce% 2 "!%light%%dark%"%flip% card
Replace one -1 card with one %pierce% 2 "!%light%%dark%"%flip% card
Replace one +0 card with one %pierce% 2 "!%fire%%ice%"%flip% card
Replace one +0 card with one %pierce% 2 "!%fire%%ice%"%flip% card
Replace two +0 cards with one +1 %dark% card and one +1 %fire% card
Replace two +0 cards with one +1 %dark% card and one +1 %fire% card
Add one +1 %disarm% "!%air%%earth%" card
Add one +1 %disarm% "!%air%%earth%" card
Add one "%heal% 1, self"%light%%flip% card and one "%heal% 1, self"%earth%%flip%
Add one +X where X is the number of elements you have consumed this turn
Add one +X where X is the number of elements you have consumed this turn
Whenever you consume an element as a mandatory part of an action, you may generate that same element
At the start of each scenario, %any%
Whenever you long rest, %any%
